org.spongepowered.api.text.serializer

Interface TextSerializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CatalogType
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FormattingCodeTextSerializer, SafeTextSerializer

    @CatalogedBy(value=TextSerializers.class)
public interface TextSerializer
extends CatalogType
    Represents a serializer for Text instances that converts an input string into a formatted Text instance, or a Text instance into the string representation.

    Custom implementations can be registered using the GameRegistry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Text deserialize(String input)
      Returns a Text instance from an appropriately formatted string.
      default Text deserializeUnchecked(String input)
      Tries to return a Text instance from the provided input string.
      String serialize(Text text)
      Returns a string representation of the provided Text in a format that will be accepted by this TextSerializer's deserialize(String) method.
      default String serializeSingle(Text text)
      Returns a string representation of only the provided Text (without any children) in a format that will be accepted by this TextSerializer's deserialize(String) method.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.CatalogType

        getId, getName

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        String serialize(Text text)
        Returns a string representation of the provided Text in a format that will be accepted by this TextSerializer's deserialize(String) method.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to serialize
        Returns:
        The string representation of this text

      • serializeSingle

        default String serializeSingle(Text text)
        Returns a string representation of only the provided Text (without any children) in a format that will be accepted by this TextSerializer's deserialize(String) method.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to serialize
        Returns:
        The string representation of this text (without any children)

      • deserialize

        Text deserialize(String input)
          throws TextParseException
        Returns a Text instance from an appropriately formatted string.
        Parameters:
        input - The raw input to parse into a text
        Returns:
        The parsed text for the input string
        Throws:
        TextParseException - If an error occurs while parsing the text

      • deserializeUnchecked

        default Text deserializeUnchecked(String input)
        Tries to return a Text instance from the provided input string. However, if the input string is not of a valid format, the returned Text object will be of the raw input, rather than throwing an exception.
        Parameters:
        input - The raw input to try to parse into a text
        Returns:
        The parsed text for the input string, or the raw input
